repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: Mary Seaman Collection of Arlington Mills Christmas Party Photographs
did.abstract: Photographs of the 1946 Christmas Party at Arlington Mills in Lawrence, Massachusetts.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Inccludes en snapshots of a Christmas Party at Arlington Mills, in Lawrence, Massachusetts. This party most likely took place in 1946. Pictured are groups of employees, Santa Claus, Christmas decorations, and mill machinery.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Mary Seaman Collection of Arlington Mills Christmas Party Photographs #6771 P. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: American Textile History Museum Collection, gift of Mary Seaman

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The ATHM # references the accession number given to collections by the American Textile History Museum. These numbers have been kept and tracked for researchers looking for former citations. For images, these numbers will also be the digital object identifier if the item was scanned.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 6517: Arlington Mills Records 6517 G: Arlington Mills Graphics 6517 GPN: Arlington Mills Glass Plate Negatives 6517 P: Arlington Mills Photographs 6517 PUBS: Arlington Mills Publications

did.unittitle: Female employees at Christmas party, ATHM# 1988.135.1

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Female employees at Christmas party, Arlington Mills, Lawrence, Mass. Gelatin silver print snapshot. Image depicts several female employees of the Arlington Mills (Mill 28) in Lawrence, Mass., at a Christmas party, probably in 1946. They are sitting at a table on which are several bottles of what appears to be wine or champagne. "Merry Xmas" sign on pole in background.

did.unittitle: Employees with Santa Claus at Christmas party, ATHM# 1988.135.2

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Employees with Santa Claus at Christmas party, Arlington Mills, Lawrence, Mass. Gelatin silver print snapshot. Image depicts several employees of the Arlington Mills (Mill 28) in Lawrence, Mass., seated at a table with Santa Claus in the background at a Christmas party, probably in 1946.

did.unittitle: Employees with Santa Claus at Christmas party, ATHM# 1988.135.3

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Employees with Santa Claus at Christmas party, Arlington Mills, Lawrence, Mass. Gelatin silver print snapshot. Image depicts several employees of the Arlington Mills (Mill 28) in Lawrence, Mass., in a group portrait with Santa Claus seated in the center. Tinsel hangs between poles in the background; Christmas party.

did.unittitle: Female employees at Christmas party, ATHM# 1988.135.4

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Female employees at Christmas party, Arlington Mills, Lawrence, Mass. Gelatin silver print snapshot. Image depicts a group of female employees posed together at a Christmas party, in the Arlington Mills (Mill 28) in Lawrence, Mass. One woman holds a 'Merry Xmas" sign; two others hold a partially obscured sign that reads, in part, "Holiday..."

did.unittitle: Male employee with Santa Claus at Christmas party, ATHM# 1988.135.5

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Male employee with Santa Claus at Christmas party, Arlington Mills, Lawrence, Mass. Gelatin silver print snapshot. Image depicts a male employee of the Arlington Mills (Mill 28) in Lawrence, Mass., with Santa Claus at a Christmas party. Tinsel hangs in the background.

did.unittitle: Female employees at table at Christmas party, ATHM# 1988.135.6

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Female employees at table at Christmas party, Arlington Mills, Lawrence, Mass. Gelatin silver print snapshot. Image depicts several female employees of the Arlington Mills (Mill 28) in Lawrence, Mass., at a table at a Christmas party. The table is loaded with plates of food and cups.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Christmas party, spinning room, Arlington Mills, Lawrence, Mass. Gelatin silver print snapshot. Image depicts a table in the spinning room of the Arlington Mills (Mill 28) in Lawrence, Mass., at a Christmas party. Several female employees are sitting at the table; one male and two female employees stand behind it. Creels and spinning machinery visible in background.

did.unittitle: Santa Claus at Christmas party, ATHM# 1988.135.8

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Santa Claus at Christmas party, Arlington Mills, Lawrence, Mass. Gelatin silver print snapshot. Image depicts Santa Claus at a Christmas party in the Arlington Mills (Mill 28) in Lawrence, Mass. The backs of several employees are visible on the right. tinsel is strung between two poles.

did.unittitle: Santa Claus with male employee at Christmas party, ATHM# 1988.135.9

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Santa Claus with male employee at Christmas party, Arlington Mills, Lawrence, Mass. Gelatin silver print snapshot. Image depicts Santa Claus seated on the knee of a male employee at a Christmas party in the Arlington Mills (Mill 28) in Lawrence, Mass. Creels and spinning machinery visible in background.

did.unittitle: Female employees at Christmas party, ATHM# 1988.135.10

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Female employees at Christmas party, Arlington Mills, Lawrence, Mass. Gelatin silver print snapshot. Image depicts a group of female employees posed together at a Christmas party in the Arlington Mills (Mill 28) in Lawrence, Mass.
